example[0]: I vaguely remember a woman in a red dress standing outside the door.
example[1]: There was something vaguely familiar about him.
example[2]: I was vaguely aware of another figure by the door.
example[3]: His statement was very vaguely worded.
definition[1]: in a way that shows you are not thinking about what you are doing
example[4]: He smiled vaguely at the ceiling.
